      • NearPOIGet

        public static java.util.List<UserIdPosition> NearPOIGet(java.lang.Integer POIID,
                                        java.lang.Integer radius,
                                        java.lang.Integer groupID,
                                        java.lang.Integer usersCount,
                                        java.lang.Boolean activeTrack,
                                        AccessTokenOAuth accessTokenPregenerated)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                                        TopoosException
        Get users near of POI
        Parameters:
        POIID - (required) Point of interest identifier.
        radius - (required) search radius in meters, should be greater than zero.
        groupID - (optional) user group identifier. If specified, the results will include only users who belong to that group.
        usersCount - (optional) number of users returned. The return will always be those closest to the point. Default value 1.
        activeTrack - (optional) the search is performed only between users who are currently active Track. Allowed values ​​"true". By default "true"
        accessTokenPregenerated - (required) access_token to user resources
        Returns:
        List
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        TopoosException

      • NearPositionGet

        public static java.util.List<UserIdPosition> NearPositionGet(java.lang.Double lat,
                                             java.lang.Double lng,
                                             java.lang.Integer radius,
                                             java.lang.Integer groupID,
                                             java.lang.Integer usersCount,
                                             java.lang.Boolean activeTrack,
                                             AccessTokenOAuth accessTokenPregenerated)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                                             TopoosException
        Get users near of a position (latitude,longitude)
        Parameters:
        lat - (required) latitude search center point. It is a required parameter is not specified poi.
        lng - (required) longitude search center point. It is a required parameter is not specified poi.
        radius - (required) search radius in meters, should be greater than zero.
        groupID - (optional) user group identifier. If specified, the results will include only users who belong to that group.
        numberUsers - (optional) number of users returned. The return will always be those closest to the point. Default value 1.
        activeTrack - (optional) the search is performed only between users who are currently active Track. Allowed values ​​"true". By default "true"
        accessTokenPregenerated - (required) access_token to user resources
        Returns:
        List
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        TopoosException
